snippet: After four months, AT&T is allowing more iPhone customers to use Apple's video conferencing app, FaceTime, over its cellular network. However, customers with unlimited data plans are still left out.
abstract: After four months, AT&T is allowing more iPhone customers to use Apple's video conferencing app, FaceTime, over its cellular network. However, customers with unlimited data plans are still left out.

headline.main: AT&T Allows FaceTime for Limited Data Users. What About Unlimited?
